settings.heading: Product Detail
settings.content:
The Jardin d’Edent gift card is an ideal selection for any event, offering versatility for the recipient. Redeemable online, a digital code will be sent via email promptly after placing your order. 

  • Delivered via email within 24 hours, our gift cards include straightforward instructions for redemption at checkout.  
  • With no extra processing fees, they provide convenience and value.  
  • They come with a 12-month expiry period for added flexibility.

settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
SHIPPING 

Orders over $100 (pre-tax) will receive FREE UPS ground shipping if located within the continental USA. Customer-paid shipping options are available at checkout. 

RETURNS 

Returns are accepted within fourteen (14) days of the original purchase date under the following conditions: 

  • Merchandise must be new and unused 
  • All original tags must be attached 
  • Jardin d'Eden not responsible for return shipping costs 

In the unlikely event that you receive a damaged or wrong item, please contact CUSTOMER SERVICE directly at (314) 947-0180. 

Once a return has been successfully accepted, refunds will be issued to the original form of payment.
